question: To what extent has the world's GDP per capita grown between 2000 and 2020?
query: SELECT    AVG(gdp_per_capita) AS avg_gdp_2000,    AVG(gdp_per_capita) FILTER (WHERE year = 2020) AS avg_gdp_2020,   (AVG(gdp_per_capita) FILTER (WHERE year = 2020) - AVG(gdp_per_capita)) / AVG(gdp_per_capita) * 100 AS growth_pct FROM    global_development_indicators WHERE    year IN (2000, 2020) LIMIT 50;
